headline: Is There Opportunity in Diamondback Energy After Viper Considers Sale of Non-Permian Assets?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Diamondback Energy stock? You are definitely not alone. With oil prices in flux and the energy sector always making headlines, it makes sense to take a closer look at what is driving Diamondback’s numbers and, more importantly, whether the current price is giving you a deal or setting you up for disappointment. Let us set the stage by looking at how the stock has behaved lately. Over the last week, shares have dipped by 3.3% to close at $139.44, showing some...
